_epochEndTime(uint256).details: return the end time (in unix time) of the epoch with epoch_id

_epochStartTime(uint256).details: return the start time (in unix time) of the epoch with epoch_id

canStartNewGame().details: return true if game can start in the current epoch

elapsedSinceEpochStart(uint256).details: return the time elapsed(in seconds) since the start of the epoch with epoch_id

epochEndTime(uint256).details: return the end time (in human-readable format) of the epoch with epoch_id

epochLength(uint256).details: return the entire time length (in seconds) of the epoch with epoch_id

epochStartTime(uint256).details: return the start time (in human-readable format) of the epoch with epoch_id

gamingDelay(uint256).details: return the gaming delay time of an epoch. if no gaming delay during that epoch, returns 0

getActiveEpochID().details: return the ID of the active epoch

getTotalEpochs().details: return the total number of epochs

hasEpochEnded(uint256).details: return true if the epoch with epoch_id has ended

hasEpochStarted(uint256).details: return true if the epoch with epoch_id has started

isEpochActive(uint256).details: return true if the epoch with epoch_id is the active epoch

isRestDay(uint256).details: return true if the epoch with epoch_id is on its rest day

isWorkingDay(uint256).details: return true if the epoch with epoch_id is on its working days

restDayEndTime().details: return the end time (in unix time) of the RestDay stage in the current active epoch

restDayStartTime().details: return the start time (in unix time) of the RestDay stage in the current active epoch

setNewEpoch().details: creates a new epoch, the ID of which is total number of epochs - 1 This function should be called by GameManager when the last game in an epoch ends in order to set new epoch

timeUntilEpochEnd(uint256).details: return the time remaining (in seconds) until the end of the epoch with epoch_id

timestampFromDateTime(uint256,uint256,ui.details: converts date and time in human-readable format to unix timestamp

timestampToDateTime(uint256).details: converts unix timestamp to date and time in human-readable format

unlockAndAddDelay(uint256,uint256).details: adds gaming delay to an epoch This function should be called by GameManager when the last game in an epoch runs longer than the intended sixDayEnd

workingDayEndTime().details: return the end time (in unix time) of the WorkingDays stage in the current active epoch

workingDayStartTime().details: return the start time (in unix time) of the WorkingDays stage in the current active epoch
